career.name: GovTech
career.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Built a case management system using React.js and Node.js to handle 1,200+ daily inquiries, improving SQL database speeds and improving response times.
Developed backend services and queuing APIs using AWS SQS to support high-load AI features, while implementing Docker containers and AWS Lambda database seeding scripts to automate CI/CD pipelines..

career.name: Hypotenuse AI
career.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
description: Built a drag-and-drop file system using React.js and DynamoDB to manage 10,000+ AI-generated documents, while speeding up bulk content generation by implementing parallel processing with Python Celery.
Reduced translation costs by 50% by switching to internal LLMs, and improved the user onboarding experience by redesigning the workflow and API polling logic.

career.name: GetSolar (Formerly SolarAI)
career.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Launched a bespoke CRM application using TypeScript and React.js to manage 200+ customer contracts at scale.
Built high-performance serverless GraphQL APIs backed by ElasticSearch, reducing customer data search times.
Achieved 90% code coverage by establishing comprehensive Jest unit and integration testing protocols.

career.name: Ministry of Digital Development and Information

description: Engineered an automated email system that saved staff-hours weekly by reducing manual communication overhead.
